Author: dom4n
Title: [ANN][PRIV] ANONHOTELS / World's first network of anonymous hotels, PRE-ICO
Body: Dear Bitcointalk Community,   we are excited to announce our upcoming Anonhotels.com PRE-ICO.  Website: https://anonhotels.com/   “I am free, anonymous man. My flights and falls occurred while I was wearing a magical cap of invisibility, my successes and sins sailed on in invisible corvettes, and films and books flew off into the abyss in invisible strongboxes. I am free, anonymous.” ― Tadeusz Konwicki, A Minor Apocalypse  Market Problem We are waiting for a holiday all year. It should be a time of peace, relaxation and fun. The carelessness, however, spoil the formalities and the enormity of the dances that we must give to the hotel or the owner of the rented apartment before the holiday. In addition to your ID, passport, and address, we often need to share an email address, phone number, even our hobbies and interests. The hotel monitors our orders, shopping, sites we are looking at in the internet while using hotels wi-fi, visits in the restaurant or in the bar. Everything so that after the holidays spam our box with personalized ads and offers in hope that they tempt us. There is no privacy or anonymity. We feel they are following us. Constantly under the watch of "Big Brother".  More and more people are tired of this approach, looking for peace and privacy, but still want to enjoy the amenities that offer hotels. The answer for such clients is Anonhotels.  Anonhotels Solution We are the first international chain of hotels offering its clients a no-compromise stay. On the one hand, top-class facilities offer their customers a wide range of services and attractions, on the other hand - privacy and safety. Our hotels will be small, intimate facilities in the best locations in the world.  Anonhotels will combine the best features of hotels and rented apartments, while giving up the arduous formalities. We guarantee total anonymity for our guests. We will not follow you, monitor your purchases or surf the web. Thanks to the blockchain technology and the PRIV token we will not have to collect any information about our guests. Payments and reservations will be made only using our token. We will offer our guests the opportunity to exchange on site their cryptocurrency for local currency. Thanks to the appropriate insurance policy we are not afraid of damage that our guests could cause in our facilities. In addition, we will provide you with the ability to use the Internet safely and anonymously.  Pre-ICO Sale Info To launch Anonhotels, we begin the sales of Pre-ICO with a minimum amount of 1,500 ETH and the maximum of 5,000 ETH. Pre-ICO will start on September 5, 2017 17:00:00 UTC. Pre-ICO participants will receive  a bonus that will depend on the time of the investment: the first investors will receive a bonus of 60% (up to 1,500 ETH), and the next investor will receive a bonus of 40% (ETH 1,500-5,000). The assumed, fixed purchase price is 1 ETH = 1000 PRIV.  ICO Info After establishing company in Switzerland or Singapore, creating a platform for cooperation with the investor community and legal analysis of 50 countries in terms of anonymous hotels we will start marketing and PR campaign for ICO. ICO will start on November 22, 2017. Money gathered in ICO will be spent in 2018 for purchase and renovation of facilities, employment of employees and putting objects into service.  Documents and Community  Website: https://www.anonhotels.com  One pager: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1kXelat9ywyoPycrKgv4mkBMd_qzPEhEA2JkE6Zi8mlU/edit?pli=1  Whitepaper: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BMi2pMHwzh3igRgT28gKDqG6gJ5o2QoM3lIWuS7buQ0/edit  Blog: https://medium.com/@anonhotels.com  Slack: https://anonhotels.slack.com/join/shared_invite/MjMwNDg3MDM2NDcwLTE1MDMzNDE4NjUtYTU5YWZhZDA0ZA  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/anonhotels  Twitter: https://twitter.com/AnonHotels_com  Summary Anonhotels is the first anonymous chain of hotels, where privacy, security and the highest standard of services are guaranteed to all hotel guests. We give to our investors possibility to investment in one of the largest, stable and fast growing industries with proven and well-prepared business plan. We provide investment security with block-chain and ethereum technology with full anonymity of the investor and PRIV token holder.

Author: ArithmomanicVampire
Title: [ANN][PRIV] ANONHOTELS / World's first network of anonymous hotels, PRE-ICO
Body: In many countries, hotels, or places offering housing in general, are legally required to record the identities of their guests. What are your plans to deal with these requirements?

Author: btcdee
Title: [ANN][PRIV] ANONHOTELS / World's first network of anonymous hotels, PRE-ICO
Body: It is literally impossible to book and stay at a decent high-end hotel anonymously so your project definitely fills up a desired niche. As far as I know, most countries require guest registration by law so I'm not sure how you will be able to oblige regulators. Looking forward to learn more about this.
